players.name: Bob
memory: You: "This is terrible! Alice is gone already. Since we have no information yet, I think we should all share our thoughts. Diana, Charlie - what are your initial reactions?"
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he is the mafioso. We must vote him out to protect the town."
Diana: "I agree with Charlie's claim. We should vote for Bob to protect the town."

You: "Charlie, that's a very bold claim to make! If you're really the detective, why would you reveal yourself so openly on Day 1? That makes you an easy target. Diana, don't you find it suspicious how quickly you agreed without any questions?"
